title: Welcome!!
intro: This is your dashboard. Once you have set up, everything will be displayed.

title: How to go to User Settings page? (1)
intro: You can jump to the User Settings page from sidebar.

title: How to go to User Settings page? (2)
intro: You can jump to the User Settings page from gear icons as well.

title: Your Profile
intro: You can set up your profile in the User Settings page.

title: Your Numbers
intro: Aggregate settings from each service can be configured on the User Settings page.

title: Time Period
intro: Specify a time period according to that you wish to look back on.

title: Want to See This Tour Again?
intro: You can view this product tour at any time by pressing this button.
